actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
   unix_timestamp(str_to_date(TimeString,'%d/%m/%Y')) as UnixTimestamp ,
	 TimeString,MsgProc,StateAfter,Action,Tablesol,Moteur, '' as Seuil, '' as Vent, '' as Batterie
FROM
    hui_loupian_exondation
		WHERE unix_timestamp(str_to_date(TimeString,'%d/%m/%Y'))
>= {{ moment(debutDate_marseillan.selectedDate).unix()}} AND unix_timestamp(str_to_date(TimeString,'%d/%m/%Y')) <= {{ moment(finDate_marseillan.selectedDate).unix()}}
UNION SELECT 
    unix_timestamp(str_to_date(TimeString,'%d/%m/%Y')) as UnixTimestamp ,TimeString,MsgProc,StateAfter,Action,Tablesol,Moteur,Seuil,Vent,Batterie
FROM
    hui_loupian_alarmes	
WHERE unix_timestamp(str_to_date(TimeString,'%d/%m/%Y'))
>= {{ moment(debutDate_marseillan.selectedDate).unix()}} AND unix_timestamp(str_to_date(TimeString,'%d/%m/%Y')) <= {{ moment(finDate_marseillan.selectedDate).unix()}}
ORDER BY 
     TimeString  DESC
limit {{ table_complet_marseillan.pageSize }} offset {{ (table_complet_marseillan.pageNo - 1) * table_complet_marseillan.pageSize }}
